title: New Google Chromecast (2015) - Awesome Stuff Week
description: Testing out the new Google Chromecast 2015.  It's officially Awesome Stuff Week on YouTube, check out the main playlist at   FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
